/hr/pl4nty.github.io-longhorn-charts-lon.title: longhorn helm release
/hr/pl4nty.github.io-longhorn-charts-lon.name: longhorn
/hr/pl4nty.github.io-longhorn-charts-lon.doc: Longhorn is an open-source, distributed block storage system for Kubernetes. It provides a fast and reliable solution for persistent storage, making it an ideal choice for a wide range of use cases, including stateful applications, databases, and more.
